title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger
descriptions:
🚘 **Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter: The Ultimate Power Companion for Your Vehicle!** 🚀

Are you tired of being stranded with a dead battery? Fear no more! The AVAPOW Car Jump Starter is your reliable roadside hero, packing a whopping 4000A peak current capable of bringing life back to any gas engine or up to 10L diesel beasts. With a robust 27800mAh battery capacity (88Wh), it's not just a jump starter but a portable power bank for your electronic devices.

🔋 **Powerful and Versatile**:
- **Jump Start with Ease**: Get up to 40 jump starts on a full charge, making it perfect for cars, motorcycles, ATVs, UTVs, lawn mowers, and snowmobiles.
- **Engine Compatibility**: Compatible with all gasoline engines and diesel engines up to 10L, ensuring no vehicle is left behind.

🔌 **Quick Charging Technology**:
- **USB Quick Charge 3.0**: Charge your devices 75% faster than ordinary power banks with dual USB ports (5V/3A, 9V/2A, 12V/1.5A and 5V/2.4A) and a Type-C input/output for added convenience.
- **Multi-Device Support**: Keep your smartphones, tablets, and other USB-powered devices fully charged while on the go.

💡 **Built-In LED Light Modes**:
- Choose from flashlight, SOS, and strobe modes to handle any emergency situation with confidence.

🛡️ **Intelligent Protection Systems**:
- Stay safe with built-in protections against short circuits, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connections.

🏕️ **Portable and Rugged**:
- **Compact Design**: Bring it anywhere with its portable size, complete with a carry case for easy storage.
- **Durable Metal Clamps**: Designed to withstand rough handling and provide secure connections.

📦 **Everything You Need in One Package**:
- Comes with Portable Battery Starter, Jumper Cables, USB-C Cable, Cigarette Lighter Converter, and User Manual. (Note: Adapter not included)

🌟 **24-Hour Online After-Sales Team**:
- Enjoy peace of mind with round-the-clock customer support ready to assist you.

Don't let a dead battery ruin your day ever again! The AVAPOW Car Jump Starter is the perfect blend of power, versatility, and convenience, making it an essential accessory for every vehicle owner. Get yours today and take the first step toward worry-free travel! 🌟👍

**Unleash the Power of AVAPOW: Your Ultimate Car Jump Starter**

Never let a dead battery disrupt your journey again! Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, the powerhouse that delivers 4000A of peak current, capable of breathing life into any gasoline vehicle or diesel engines up to 10L. This compact yet mighty gadget is your reliable companion for any roadside emergency.

**Robust and Ready for Anything**
With a massive 27800mAh battery capacity and an 88Wh portable battery charger, the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter ensures up to 40 jump starts on a full charge. Whether you're driving a car, motorcycle, ATV, UTV, lawn mower, or snowmobile, this jump starter has got you covered.

**Advanced Protection, Enhanced Safety**
Equipped with an intelligent protection system, it safeguards against short circuits, low batteries, high temperatures, and reverse connections. With AVAPOW, you can jump-start your vehicle with complete peace of mind.

**Multi-functional LED Light for Emergencies**
Whether you need a flashlight for visibility, an SOS signal for help, or a strobe light for alerts, the built-in LED light with multiple modes is ready to serve your needs in any unforeseen situation.

**Power Up On the Go**
Thanks to its USB Quick Charge 3.0 and Type-C input/output, you can charge your devices up to 75% faster than with ordinary power banks. The rugged design and metal clamps are built to withstand the toughest environments while being easily portable.

**Stay Connected with Top-Notch Support**
The AVAPOW Car Jump Starter comes with a comprehensive package including a portable battery starter, jumper cables, USB-C cable, cigarette lighter converter, carry case, and user manual. Plus, you get the reassurance of a 24-hour online after-sales team, ready to assist you whenever you need.

Don't let a dead battery hold you back. Grab your AVAPOW Car Jump Starter today and be prepared for any adventure that lies ahead!

Stranded with a dead car battery? Worry no more! The AVAPOW Car Jump Starter provides a colossal 4000A peak current, capable of breathing life into any gas engine and diesel engines up to 10L. With the power of a mammoth 27800mAh battery (88Wh), this isn't just a jump starter—it's your portable power guardian.

**Key Features:**

- **Unmatched Power**: With 4000A peak current, jump-start your vehicle with ease, whether it's a car, motorcycle, ATV, UTV, lawn mower, or snowmobile.
- **Massive Battery Capacity**: A 27800mAh powerhouse ensures up to 40 jump starts on a single charge. Never be caught powerless again!
- **Speedy Charging**: The USB Quick Charge 3.0 port means your devices get fueled up 75% faster than ordinary power banks. Plus, with the additional Type-C input/output and a 5V/2.4A USB port, your gadgets will always stay charged.
- **All-Round Protection**: Equipped with intelligent protection systems, this jump starter shields against short circuits, low battery, high temperatures, and reverse connections.
- **Emergency LED Light**: Stuck in the dark? The built-in LED light with flashlight, SOS, and strobe modes will be your beacon in the night.
- **Rugged & Portable**: Designed for the on-the-go lifestyle, it's ready for any challenge with a rugged exterior and convenient carry case.

**What's in the Box?**

- Portable Battery Starter
- Jumper Cables with Metal Clamps
- USB-C Cable
- Cigarette Lighter Converter
- Durable Carry Case
- Comprehensive User Manual

**After-Sales Support**: Rest easy with a 24-hour online after-sales team ready to assist you with any concerns.

Don't let a dead battery ruin your day. The AVAPOW Car Jump Starter is your reliable partner for power when and where you need it most. Grab yours and take the first step towards an unstoppable journey!
